array = [0] * 10000
t = input()
count = 0
number = 0
for i in range(0,t):
	n = input()
	current = raw_input()
	for j in current.split():
		array[int(j)-1] += 1	
	for j in range(0,10000):
		if array[j]>count:
			count = array[j]		
			number = j+1			
			
	print number,count 
	count = 0			
	array = [0] * 10000
